posts.post_content:
Selling a Chick Gandil SGC 40 VG T-206. Extremely clean looking card. Apologize for pictures as I do not have my scanner at my disposal right now. Case is clean and undamaged - residue shown near bottom is from a sticker that was there. Will easily come off.

Piedmont 350/460 Factory 25.

$135.00 Shipped via PPFF - card also going up on eBay so will be pulled here if sold there.

I am trying to load images but getting an error message. I will try to post below in a separate message or please PM me for scans.

Still unable to post photos and keep receiving an error.

But you can view them in the eBay listing here: [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/-/281854905431?[/url]
